commit.message: Re-adds raw marker for docstrings where needed to please flake8
More minor docs fixes that hadn't popped up before
Merge pull request #538
Solves all remaining markup errors and warings in the docs
Further updates to the contribute.rst
Fix documentation warnings and build instruction
Merge branch 'schema-normalization' from pull request #534

Includes configured registries to Validator._config

This commit also removes the plan to fetch config with __getattr__,
neither was it better to read, nor faster.
Surprisingly, replacing self._config.get(name, default) with
self._config["name"] turned out to be 5% slower with CPython 3.8.
Adds annotations about type constraint conversions

Adds a cache for normalized rule sets

It has no impact on a long running application with one schema, but the
test suite takes 25% less time.
Normalizes constraints for dependencies and excludes
Minor cleanups and micro optimizations in the base module
Reduces overhead to extrapolate schemas for validation
Stores visited references in sets when validating schemas
Removes an obsolete method
Input documents are only copied when normalizing
Moves error sorting to the end of document processings
Adds type check to RulesRegistry.add and simplifies code
Initializes ValidatedSchema.__repr__ content immediately on creation

Overhauls schema normalization

It ensures that new opjects are returned and centers the process around
the rules set normalization which flattens the code and is better to
read.

Moves ingnore_none_values evaluation to nullable handler

it slightly increases validation speed when the option is not set and
is probably better readable

Adds schema normalization for allow_unknown constrains

along with lookup reduction in the metaclass

Normalization handlers RuntimeErrors are not ignored

as they shouldn't be caused by an unexpected value but a problem of the
application.
Removes unnecessary exception handlers
Adds a few TODO annotations to the code
Adapts the benchmarks for the version 2 branch
Adds a benchmark to compare overall performance
Replaces a deprecated decorator from the abc module

Fixes schema normalization with regards to referenced entities

so far a schema reference would have aborted schema normalization,
similar situations are also handled similarly
Fixes representation of unvalidated ValidatedSchema instances
